DOC.brief_summary: The combination of fiber and protein added to pasta will enhance satiety.
DOC.brief_title: Satiety Effects of Protein and Fiber Added to Pasta
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects will consume 3 different pasta lunches and satiety will be measured by visual analogue scales. They will consume an ad lib snack after 3 hours and food intake will be measured.
DOC.criteria: healthy nonsmoking body mass index from 19 29 Antibiotic use any disease weight loss food allergies high fiber intake restrained eater
